Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to advertising employment opportunities
Summary: Requires that posting or advertising of any employment opportunities shall include the salary range and starting salary for the position except where otherwise provided by a collectively bargained agreement.
LawCode: Amd §6, add §159-c, Civ Serv L; add §655, Exec L; amd §350-a, Gen Bus L; add §§219-d & 920, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, the executive law, the general business law and the labor law, in relation to advertising employment opportunities
